pullrequest.title: Word-wrapping in treeviews and item views, adapted from David Meyer's implementation.

content.raw: Ok, so the not valid Python variable name pop-up is ‘fixed’ for me with the “Highlight text when editing global values” commit. It looks like in the initial pass the ‘<Click to add global>’ string was automatically being deleted whenever editing was engaged. Explicitly setting the editor data seems to has returned things to their usual behavior.
